title.value: Использование методов математического моделирования при оценке систем удобрения и оптимизации минерального питания свеклы столовой
Application of methods of mathematical modelling in estimation of fertilizer systems and optimization of mineral nutrition of table beet
Application of methods of mathematical modelling in estimation of fertilizer systems and optimization of mineral nutrition of table beet

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Stepuro, M.F., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the results of nonlinear regression analysis of experimental data, there were constructed a steam room models of table beet (Beta vulgaris) dependence on the dose of nitrogen, phosphate and potash fertilizers. The studied dependence was very precisely described by the equations of a parabola of the second degree. By means of resolving these equations there were defined the optimal doses of nitrogen, phosphate and potash fertilizers in which there were obtained the maximum yield of beetroot varieties on sod-podzolic soil under irrigation and without applying it.
